twocolconflictprovidesubmittedtext: Title for the special page that provides the originally submitted text to copy it.
twocolconflict-beta-feature-message: Label for the TwoColConflict Beta Feature.
twocolconflict-beta-feature-description: Description for the TwoColConflict Beta Feature, describing the feature that will be enabled.
twocolconflict-copy-action: Action link label which lets the user copy their original wikitext.
twocolconflict-copy-notice: Notification displayed after successfully copying to clipboard.
twocolconflict-copy-tab-action: Action link label which lets the user open a new tab to copy their original wikitext.
twocolconflict-copy-tab-tooltip: Tooltip displayed for the action link to open a new tab for your original wikitext.
twocolconflict-copy-tooltip: Tooltip displayed for the action link to copy your original wikitext.
twocolconflict-core-ui-hint: Note shown to users experiencing the MediaWiki core edit conflict pointing to the new feature.
twocolconflict-core-ui-hint-close: Tooltip explaining the side effect of the close button, which is that the message will never been shown again.
twocolconflict-preference-enabled: Label for the user preference that enables the paragraph-based edit conflict interface.
twocolconflict-special-footer-hint: Hint at the bottom of the special page to copy your original wikitext how to return to the conflict resolution screen.
twocolconflict-special-header-overview: Brief help message explaining the two-column workflow when you're on the special page to copy your original wikitext.
twocolconflict-special-not-saved: Header for the special page to copy your original wikitext that was not saved yet.
twocolconflict-special-textarea-hint: Label for the textarea on the special page to copy your original wikitext.
twocolconflict-special-malformed-title: Error message when the special page to copy your original wikitext is (e.g. manually) called without a title, or with an invalid title.
twocolconflict-special-expired: Error message when the special page to copy your original wikitext is either called with a title that never had an edit conflict, or called to late, and the cached wikitext expired already.
twocolconflict-split-header-hint: General hint shown on top of the edit conflict interface.
twocolconflict-split-header-hint-beta: Beta feature specific hint shown on top of the edit conflict interface.
twocolconflict-split-header-overview: Brief help message explaining the two-column workflow, when advanced help isn't available.
twocolconflict-split-your-version-header: Header for the diff column showing the users changes.
twocolconflict-split-current-version-hea:
Header for the diff column showing the latest successfully saved revision.

Parameters:
* $1 - Relative (e.g. "1 second ago") or absolute time and date the revision was saved
twocolconflict-split-not-saved-at: Header for the diff column showing the conflicting, not yet published revision the current user aims to save.
twocolconflict-split-saved-at:
{{notranslate}}
Header for the diff column showing the latest successfully saved revision.

Parameters:
* $1 - User name and tool links
twocolconflict-split-choose-version: Label for the version selection on conflicting paragraphs, when neither column has been selected.
twocolconflict-split-other-version-chose: Label for the version selection on conflicting paragraphs when the "other" edit has been selected as the starting point.
twocolconflict-split-your-version-chosen: Label for the version selection on conflicting paragraphs when "your" edit has been selected as the starting point.
twocolconflict-split-select-all: Label for the version selection used to select all paragraphs of one column.
twocolconflict-split-tour-dialog-dot-mes: Text for the blue dot explanation shown on the first screen of the help dialog.
twocolconflict-split-tour-dialog-header: Text for the header on the first screen of the help dialog.
twocolconflict-split-tour-dialog-message: Text for the message on the first screen of the help dialog.
twocolconflict-split-tour-dialog-btn-tex: Text for the close button on the first screen of the help dialog.
twocolconflict-split-tour-popup-btn-text: Text for the close button on any popup in the help dialog.
twocolconflict-split-tour-popup1-header: Text for the header of the popup explaining "Conflicting versions".
twocolconflict-split-tour-popup1-message:
Text for the message of the popup explaining "Conflicting versions".

For a right-to-left language, swap "right" and "left".
twocolconflict-split-tour-popup2-header: Text for the header of the popup explaining "Highlighted text".
twocolconflict-split-tour-popup2-message: Text for the message of the popup explaining "Highlighted text".
twocolconflict-split-tour-popup3-header: Text for the header of the popup explaining "Choose a base version".
twocolconflict-split-tour-popup3-message: Text for the message of the popup explaining "Choose a base version".
twocolconflict-split-edit-tooltip: Label for the edit button shown on diff paragraphs.
twocolconflict-split-save-tooltip: Label for the save button shown on diff paragraphs to save changes in that paragraph.
twocolconflict-split-reset-tooltip: Label for the reset button shown on diff paragraphs.
twocolconflict-split-reset-warning: Message for the warning shown to the user when the reset button was pressed. This message confirms whether or not the user wants to discard their changes.
twocolconflict-split-reset-warning-cance:
Label for the cancel button of the reset warning.
{{Identical|Cancel}}
twocolconflict-split-reset-warning-accep: Label for the accept button of the reset warning.
twocolconflict-split-collapse-tooltip: Label for the collapse button to collapse an unchanged text paragraph.
twocolconflict-split-expand-tooltip: Label for the expand button to expand an unchanged text paragraph.
twocolconflict-split-select-all-other-to: Label for the unselected radio button used to choose all changes of the other revision.
twocolconflict-split-select-all-your-too: Label for the unselected radio button used to choose all changes of your revision.
twocolconflict-split-selected-all-other-: Label for the selected radio button used to choose all changes of the other revision.
twocolconflict-split-selected-all-your-t: Label for the selected radio button used to choose all changes of your revision.
twocolconflict-split-select-other-toolti: Label for the unselected radio button used to choose a change of the other revision.
twocolconflict-split-select-your-tooltip: Label for the unselected radio button used to choose a change of your revision.
twocolconflict-split-selected-other-tool: Label for the selected radio button used to choose a change of the other revision.
twocolconflict-split-selected-your-toolt: Label for the selected radio button used to choose a change of your revision.
twocolconflict-split-tour-dialog-header-: Text for the header on the first screen of the help dialog when using the single column view.
twocolconflict-split-tour-dialog-message: Text for the message on the first screen of the help dialog when using the single column view.
twocolconflict-split-tour-dialog-btn-tex: Text for the close button on the first screen of the help dialog when using the single column view.
twocolconflict-talk-header-overview: Brief help message explaining the talk page workflow, when advanced help isn't available.
twocolconflict-talk-your: Label for your comment when solving a conflict with two talk page comments.
twocolconflict-talk-conflicting: Label for the conflicting comment when solving a conflict with two talk page comments.
twocolconflict-talk-switch-tooltip: Label for the button that allows changing the order of two conflicting entries, i.e. which one should precede the other one.
twocolconflict-talk-reorder-prompt: Label prompting the user to choose an order for two conflicting entries.
twocolconflict-talk-same-order: Button label used in talk page conflicts, to keep the conflicting entries in the same order.
twocolconflict-talk-reverse-order: Button label used in talk page conflicts, to reverse the order of conflicting entries.
